description: This file sets up and configures a vector database using Pinecone, integrates it with a PDF knowledge base, and creates an agent that can query this knowledge base to answer questions about recipes.

classes.name: PineconeDb
classes.description: A class representing the Pinecone vector database integration.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class representing a knowledge base built from PDF URLs, integrated with a vector database.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that interacts with the knowledge base and processes queries.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating and upserting data.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a query, optionally formatted in markdown.
